metatab-latest: Collection of mulltiple, simpler datasets from OpenJustice that don't require special processing

column4: A transparency initiative led by the California Department of Justice that publishes criminal justice data so we can understand how we are doing, hold ourselves accountable, and improve public policy to make California safer.
Index page for all Open Justice datasets
Arrests counts aggregated to year, race, agency and other factors
Arrests counts aggregated to year, race, agency and other factors, but disaggregated on disposition.
Summary of civilian complaints by agency
Counts of reported cimes and clearances, by year and agency
Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice Personnel
Law Enforcement Officers Killed or Assaulted
